tsinterp.name: tsinterp
tsinterp.description: A class that is used to interpolate the missing documents in the timeseries. Two public methods: a constructor 'tsinterp' that learns the timeseries values and a method 'smooth' that takes as parameter a date (string with ISO format) and returns a document with interpolated values. Based on the Smooth.js module.

tsproc.name: tsproc
tsproc.description:
Timeseries processor is a class that works
with timeseries and offers different methods
to process it.

tsreductions.name: tsreductions
tsreductions.description:
Class contaning the reduction functions
used by the tsproc class.

classitems.name: INTERP_METHODS
classitems.type: array Description of interpolation methods. Methods comparation could be found here.

classitems.description:
A public constructor that initiates the class and then
learns the datapoints.
classitems.name: tsinterp

params.name: timeseries
params.description: A timeseries to learn. An array of JSONs

params.name: description
params.description: A description of fields and timestamps (with their format) of the each document of timeseries

classitems.description:
A main public method that takes in the date
and determines based on the previously learnt values
the interpolated document with given date.
classitems.name: smooth

classitems.description: A private method used to generate a json document.
classitems.name: createDoc

params.name: time
params.description: An ISO string representing the date

params.name: values
params.description: An array of values of document fields

classitems.description:
A private method used to exract an array of dates (moment.js dates) of all the documents.
[{date: 1911, a: 2, b: 4},{date: 1912, a: 3, b: 1}] ==> [1911, 1912]].
classitems.name: extractDates

classitems.description:
A private method used to exract an array of values of all the documents.
[{date: 1911, a: 2, b: 4},{date: 1912, a: 3, b: 1}] ==> [[2, 4], [3, 1]].
classitems.name: extractValues

classitems.description:
A private method that learns the values
of each document of the timeseries.
classitems.name: learn

classitems.description:
A public constructor that is used to initiate 
the class. It takes in an array of timeseries.
classitems.name: tsproc

params.name: timeseries
params.description: An array of timeseries. Each one should be sorted

classitems.description:
A main public method that processes the array of timeseries. It returns (via callback) a one timeseries with timestamp field 'time' in the ISO format. This timeseries correspond to the fusion of an array of timeseries, and if they are not homogeneous the interpolation would be applyed.
The processing takes the next steps: - if the borders(min and max dates) are specified in the config file, the timeseries would be cut - all the dates would be transformed to the ISO string - if there are multiple timeseries, and they are not homogeneous, all the timeseries would be interpolated or intersected (ie leaving only the documents with dates that are present in all the timeseries) - if the are multiple timeseries, they would be fused into one timeseries document by document - the output timeseries the timestamp field would be called 'time' - finally, if the skip value is defined, the timeseries would undersampled to decrease the size of the timeseries
classitems.name: process

classitems.description:
Public method that returns one timeseries it there is one, on an array
if trere are many.
classitems.name: getTS

return.description: One or an array of timeseries

classitems.description: Public method that returns a timeseries config json.
classitems.name: getConfig

classitems.description:
Public method that returns the current number of timeseries in 
the tsproc.
classitems.name: getNbTS

classitems.description:
Public method that returns the number of documents in the queried timeseries
If there is no timeseries specified, return the size of the first one.
classitems.name: getTSSize

classitems.description: Public method that returns the timestamp value (moment.js) of a specified document.
classitems.name: getTimestamp

params.name: doc_index
params.description: The index of the document in the timeseries

classitems.description: Public method that returns the name of timestamp field of specified timeseries.
classitems.name: getTimestampField

classitems.description: Public method that returns the format of timestamp field of specified timeseries.
classitems.name: getTimestampFormat

classitems.description: Public method that returns one document from the timeseries.
classitems.name: getTimestampField

params.name: doc_index
params.description: The index of the document in the timeseries

classitems.description:
Public method that returns an empty document.
It is generated from a normal doucment (specified
by ts_index and doc_index) by emptying all the fields
except the timestamp
Used by tsreductions class.
classitems.name: getEmptyDoc

params.name: doc_index
params.description: The index of the document in the timeseries. Used to

classitems.description:
Public method that takes a timestamp and returns a document from
the timeseries that corresponds to it.
classitems.name: getDocByTimestamp

params.name: timestamp
params.description: A string with date in ISO format

classitems.description: Public method that returns an array of fields present in the specified timeseries (ie in each of it's document).
classitems.name: getFields

classitems.description:
Public method that returns an average number of timestamps per day.
The timeseries should be homogeneous.
classitems.name: getAvgPerDay

return.description: An average number of timestamps per day

classitems.description:
Public method that returns the date border (the earliest and the oldest timestamp) in 
all the timeseries.
classitems.name: getBorders

return.description: An array with date (string with ISO format) borders

classitems.description:
Public method that verifies wheather the timeseries is homogeneous.
If there is only one timeseries, it is considered homogeneous.
If there are many, they are considered homogeneous if every timeseries
has the same timestamps in the same order.
classitems.name: isHomogeneous

return.description: Wheather a bunch of timeseries are homogeneous

classitems.description:
Public method that checks wheather the format of the dates in each
timeseries is correct.
classitems.name: isValid

return.description: Wheather the date format is correct

classitems.description: Public method that renames a field in the specified timeseries
classitems.name: renameField

classitems.description:
Public method that checks wheather the timestamps have ISO format.
The method checks only the config json, it does not verify the timestamps
of all documents.
classitems.name: isISO

return.description: Wheather the timestamp have the ISO format

classitems.description:
Public method that passes all the timestamps 
to the ISO format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.SSSSZ).
The name of the timestamps is not changed.
classitems.name: toISO

classitems.description:
Public method used to leave in the 
timeseries only the documents between
two dates specified in the date_borders array
classitems.name: cut

params.name: date_borders
params.description:
An array of two dates 
(ISO strings)

classitems.description:
Public method used to merge two or more timeseries 
into one timeseries. The timeseries should be homogeneous.
The result timeseries would have only one timestamp field 
(it's name is specified by TIMESTAMP_FIELD proprety).
classitems.name: merge

classitems.description:
Public method that is used to reduce the number
of documents in the timeseries by different
methods. Applied only if the timeseries are homogeneous.
Uses a tsreductions module.
The reduction mehtods are: 
- skip: choose one document from skipsize documents
- sum: sum the values of skipsize documents into one
- avg: average the values of skipsize documents into one
- max: choose one document from skipsize documents with the maximum value of target_field
- min: choose one document from skipsize documents with the minimum value of target_field
classitems.name: undersample

params.name: type
params.description: An index of ReduceEnum with reduction methods

params.name: skipsize
params.description: An index of ReduceEnum with reduction methods from ReduceFunc

params.name: target_field
params.description: A targeted field to calculate the max or min reduction

classitems.description: Public mehtod that could be applied to two or more timeseries to interpolate the missing datapoints (document) in relation to each other. Interpolation methods are: linear, cubic, lanczos, and neares neighbor. Methods comparaison could be found here. Timestamps should be the ISO strings. Uses a tsinterp module.
classitems.name: interpolate

params.name: type
params.description: An index of InterpEnum with interpolation methods

classitems.description:
Public mehtod that could be applied to two or more timeseries
to simplify them and leave only the documents that have the same
timestamps.
Timestamps should be the ISO strings.
classitems.name: intersect

classitems.description:
Public method that is used to check the local similarity between the fields of a timeseries. Does this by caclulating the local correlation. So a timeseries should be merged (ie the function works with only a single one timeseries) and have at least two non-timestamp fields.
The similarity is indicated by adding a new field 'correlation' to each document. If value of this field is not 'false', it means that a document is a part of range of documents that are strongly correlated. The correlation is considered strong if correalation coef is > 0.6.
More info about correlation can be found here.
classitems.name: checkSimilarity

classitems.description:
Private function that merges the configuration of 
multiple timeseries into one.
The final timestamp name is defined by the 
TIMESTAMP_FIELD propretie.
classitems.name: mergeConfigs

classitems.description:
Private method that returns the minimal (the earliest)
date of all the timeseries.
classitems.name: getMinDate

classitems.description:
Private method that returns the maximal (the oldest)
date of all the timeseries.
classitems.name: getMaxDate

classitems.description:
Private method that cuts in a single timeseries all the documents
that are bellow the specified index.
Index is also cut.
classitems.name: cutBellow

params.name: ts_index
params.description: An index of a timeseries to cut

params.name: index
params.description: An index bellow which to cut

classitems.description:
Private method that cuts in a single timeseries all the documents
that are above the specified index.
Index is also cut.
classitems.name: cutAbove

params.name: ts_index
params.description: An index of a timeseries to cut

params.name: index
params.description: An index bellow which to cut

classitems.description:
Private method that cuts in all the 
timeseries the documents that are earlier 
than max_date.
classitems.name: cutAboveMax

classitems.description:
Private method that cuts in all the 
timeseries the documents that are older 
than min_date.
classitems.name: cutBellowMin

classitems.description:
Private method that returns an array
of all the possible dates of all the timeseries (without duplication).
The timestamps of all the timeseries shoud be the ISO strings.
Final array of dates is sorted.
classitems.name: getAllDates

return.description: An array of all possible dates (ISO strings) in all the timeseries

classitems.description:
Private method that returns an array
of dates that are included in all the timeseries.
The timestamps of all the timeseries shoud be the ISO strings.
classitems.name: getSameDates

return.description: An array of dates (ISO strings) that are part of all timeseries

classitems.description:
Private method that returns an array
of all the dates present in a single timeseries.
classitems.name: getTSDates

params.name: ts_index
params.description: An index of a timeseries to extract the dates

return.description: An array of dates from a specific timeseries

classitems.description: Reduction by skipping 'skipsize' documents.
classitems.name: reduceSkip

params.name: skipsize
params.description: A number of documents to skip

example: var reduced_timseries = reduceSkip.call(this, 5); //calling from tsproc

classitems.description:
Reduction by summing the values of all the
fields of 'skipsize' documents.
classitems.name: reduceSum

params.name: skipsize
params.description:
A number of documents to
calculate the sum (of the respective fields of each document)

example: var reduced_timseries = reduceSum.call(this, 5); //calling from tsproc

classitems.description:
Reduction by averaging the values of all the
fields of 'skipsize' documents.
classitems.name: reduceAvg

params.name: skipsize
params.description:
A number of documents to
calculate the average (of the respective fields of each document)

example: var reduced_timseries = reduceAvg.call(this, 5); //calling from tsproc

classitems.description:
Reduction by finding the document with
the max value of 'target_field' between 'skipsize' documents.
classitems.name: reduceMax

params.name: skipsize
params.description: A number of documents to calculate the max

params.name: target_field
params.description:
A field by which all the documents are compared
to calculate the max

example: var reduced_timseries = reduceMax.call(this, 5, 'temp'); //calling from tsproc

classitems.description:
Reduction by finding the document with
the min value of 'target_field' between 'skipsize' documents.
classitems.name: reduceMin

params.name: skipsize
params.description: A number of documents to calculate the min

params.name: target_field
params.description:
A field by which all the documents are compared
to calculate the min

example: var reduced_timseries = reduceMin.call(this, 5, 'temp'); //calling from tsproc
